mapper.update: UPDATE file_userfile SET filepath=REPLACE(filepath, #{oldFilePath}, #{filePath}) WHERE filepath LIKE N'${oldFilePath}%' AND userId = #{userId};
UPDATE file_userfile SET filePath=REPLACE(filePath, #{param1}, #{param2}) WHERE filePath LIKE N'${param1}%' AND userId = #{param3}

INSERT INTO file_userfile (deleteBatchNum, deleteFlag, deleteTime, extendName, fileId, fileName, filePath, isDir, uploadTime, userId) (SELECT deleteBatchNum, deleteFlag, deleteTime, extendName, fileId, fileName, REPLACE(filePath, #{oldFilePath}, #{newFilePath}), isDir, uploadTime, userId FROM file_userfile WHERE filePath LIKE N'${oldFilePath}%' AND userId = #{userId} )
